Package org.spf4j.failsafe Description

This package contains operation retry utilities. Why yet another package? 1) No Exception lost + ability to propagate checked exceptions (Sync mode only). 2) Retry operation can be different from original operation. (redirect, fallback, etc...) 3) The retry operation can be executed with delay which can be a function of the response or exception. 4) Timeouts are core functionality.
